__TOC__

* ''Please do not edit unless you are a release manager''
* Freezes normally happen at the start of the given date, UTC time.  So last minute changes need to happen the day before.
* Some background information and Q&A about the Ubuntu release process can be found on TimeBasedReleases
* UEC Image Refresh happens on Tuesdays not Thursdays of week listed.
* Launchpad release plans can be found at <nowiki>[[https://wiki.canonical.com/Launchpad/Strategy/2011RelCalDraft | Launchpad Schedule]]</nowiki>
